com.google.publicalerts.cap
Class CapXmlBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.google.publicalerts.cap.CapXmlBuilder

public class CapXmlBuilder
extends Object

Writes an Alert to an XML document. Supports CAP 1.0, 1.1, and 1.2.

Field Summary
static int DEFAULT_INDENT
           
 
Constructor Summary
CapXmlBuilder()
          Creates a new XML builder that prints with newlines and 2-space indent.
CapXmlBuilder(Integer indent)
          Creates a new XML builder with the given printing options.

Constructor Detail

CapXmlBuilder

public CapXmlBuilder()
Creates a new XML builder that prints with newlines and 2-space indent.

CapXmlBuilder

public CapXmlBuilder(Integer indent)
Creates a new XML builder with the given printing options.

Parameters:
indent - number of spaces to indent each element. If null, do not indent.

Writes the given alert to XML in the given writer.

Parameters:

toXmlDocument

public Element toXmlDocument(AlertOrBuilder alert,
                             Document document)
Converts the alert to an XML element tree rooted at the return node.

Parameters:
alert - the alert to convert
document - the document used to create the nodes for the element tree
